sentences.en: Charges had already been made against certain officials suspected of disloyalty.
sentences.cn: 对某些有不忠嫌疑的官员已经提起了诉讼。

sentences.en: Disloyalty and betrayal have undermined resistance throughout the war.
sentences.cn: 在整个战争时期,不忠和背叛使抵抗遭到破坏.

sentences.en: He hated happiness bought with disloyalty and cruelty and indifference.
sentences.cn: 他憎恨用不忠、残忍和冷漠换来的幸福.

sentences.en: He was dismayed to learn of their disloyalty.
sentences.cn: 他得知他们对他的不忠,感到很失望.

sentences.en: His, disloyalty stabbed me to the heart.
sentences.cn: 他对我不忠使我伤透了心.

sentences.en: I was stabbed to the heart by his disloyalty.
sentences.cn: 他的背信弃义深深伤害了我的心.

sentences.en: In France, yellow flowers symbolize disloyalty.
sentences.cn: 在法国, 黄色的花是不忠诚的.

sentences.en: The defeats and final failure had been due to others - to their " disloyalty and betrayal ".
sentences.cn: 失败和最后的溃败则应归咎于别人,归咎于他们的 “ 不忠和背叛. ”

sentences.en: They may even accuse the child of disloyalty.
sentences.cn: 他们甚至责备孩子不忠诚.

sentences.en: They may even accuse them of disloyalty, or make some spiteful remark about the friends'parents.
sentences.cn: 他们甚至责备孩子不忠诚, 或者心怀恶意地评论那些小朋友的父母.

sentences.en: They may even accuse them of disloyalty.
sentences.cn: 他们甚至责备孩子不忠.

sentences.en: With such a state of national unity the problem of disloyalty or isolationism scarcely existed.
sentences.cn: 有了这样全国团结的局面,不忠贞和孤立主义问题就几乎不存在了.

sentences.en: Yes, loyalty is always needed. But sometimes disloyalty is also his loyalty.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 忠诚肯定需要,但是有时候不忠诚也是他的忠诚.
